text: Call the young boss to check the price of swapping the tyres of 2 cars. He quote me $60 for swapping the wheels and $80 for swapping the tyres. So i went down to the shop the next day to swap and told him i decide to swap the tyres. Young boss ask me how much he quote me, and i told him the price. He says cannot be as he needs to change 8 tyres and asked for $120. I show him my phone with the phone call record and he says he cannot be quoting me that price. My friend near by says that there is no point to swap for $120 as my exisiting tyres still have 30-40 percent. I could not help as their fast hand workers already start swapping. Last he say 人在做，天在看，and reluctantly accept the $80 job. I told him that he need not make such comments, i am no con man. I had changed my tyres at his shop before as a returning customer. Honestly, i would not make the trip for a $120 swap. disappointed with the way he dealt with this biz deal, i will not go back again.

I had a punctured front left tyre n had to replace two tyres for $340 (excluding $50 to tow my car) on the 6th Aug 24. On the 27th Dec 24 my hubby sent our car for servicing and my hubby realised the two front tyres were already bald. So I'm not certain if TS Auto actually replaced new tyres as they only lasted about 4 months. Anyway I'm certainly not going there anymore.
Tyre leaking due to a nail. Happen to be around here and find the nearest workshop to repair. Very professional and efficient done.  Highly recommended as they charge a fair price

Service is fast but sale person has to be more ethical. Quoted a price for tyre replacement before work and gave another higher price after completion. Use unscrupulous tactic to coerce customer to change rims. Beware!!

Eric has been very responsive and patient, even during the night, to my inquiries.
Also a big thumbs up to his team for resolving my issue on losing the lock nut key  and changing out the wheels so fast then you could imagine.

Glad to have gone with TS Auto for the upgrade and highly recommend them.
